article.title: Softchoice to Provide Software Assurance
article.text: Softchoice Corp., McLean, Virginia, is being awarded $42,557,745 for firm-fixed-price delivery order NS09 under a previously awarded single blanket purchase agreement (M67854-12-A-4701) to procure Microsoft brand name software support, known as software assurance.?The contracting activity, the Space and Naval Warfare System Command, San Diego, California, will award the delivery order on behalf of its organizational partner, Program Executive Office for Enterprise Information Systems.
